original_text: It is a regular burnt offering that God told you about. He told you about it on Sinai mountain. It is an offering by fire to the Lord. The smell as it burns makes the Lord happy.
korean_text: 이는 시내 산에서 정한 상번제로서 여호와께 드리는 향기로운 화제며

sentences.original_text: It is a regular burnt offering
He told you about it on Sinai mountain
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 시내 산에서 그것에 대해 말씀하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: It is an offering by fire to the Lord
